about_the_game:
Grey Galactic is a real time strategy game, where you colonize planets to collect their resources and have a base to build ships. By collecting resources, improving your buildings and ships, and expanding your empire to new planets, you will use your fleet of ships to try to destroy the enemy before they can destroy you.

  • Strategic Real Time Battling - Build your fleet of upgradeable ships to explore, expand, and conquer! Ranging from simple ships to attack with, scout ships to explore the galaxy, and settler ships to take new planets, you can strategically position your fleet to defend your planets, and take down your enemies!

  • Heroic Capital Ships - The powerful Capital Ship is your secret weapon in battle, as a free moving ship that can hold other ships as a mobile base. With unique abilities to help in battle, the Capital Ship can be the ultimate force to turn the battle!

  • Unique Consumable Artifacts - The universe is full of mystery, and powerful artifacts from both ancient civilizations and modern science will aid you in different ways. Want to quickly spawn in an extra few ships? Maybe instantly settle a new planet? With research into these powerful items, you can use them throughout the game to become an even greater captain!

  • Varied and Numerous Battlefields - With a powerful map generator, Grey Galactic features both randomly generated and hand crafted systems to explore. Including planets, moons, asteroid fields, ship-destroying-voids, pirates, space stations, wormholes, and more, each battle is a unique experience!

  • Scenario, Campaign, and Survival Modes - In addition to Scenario maps where you'll have to overcome a unique enemy and challenging Survival games where you try to outlast the onslaught of enemies, there will also be a 3 part, story driven campaign that explores the themes and history of this universe. Learn about the tumultuous past between the human factions of the UFMC and The Skeptics, the desperate fighters of the alien faction of The Proditum, and the mysterious and incredibly dangerous Grey.

Claim planets and build up to 12 different structures on the planet surfaces to collect resources, build ships, and advance your research towards newer buildings and ships. Upgrade those buildings to unlock even better resource collection and ship construction. Be smart about where to place buildings to maximize the resources you can harvest, and think about how to maximize the limited space on each planet!

Add ships to your fleet to use for attacks, exploration, and discovery! Build ships to fight your enemies, to colonize planets, and to explore the unknown. Send your ships to new planets, to collect space loot, or just to explore the wonders and mysteries of the galaxy around you!

Send your ships to enemy planets to conquer the galaxy! By using a strategic combination of ships that can attack enemies, buff your other ships, and hit extra hard, there are limitless ways to engage the dangerous Proditum and deadly Grey!

Grey Galactic takes place in the distant future, where the human faction of the United Federation Marine Corps has been at war with the alien race known as The Proditum for years. As the war has waged on, many battles and skirmishes have taken place, with the war in a terrible stalemate for years. The humans have a trick up their sleeve though, deep in a top secret weapons development research facility. Will it be enough to turn the tide?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000, Radeon, Nvidia card with shader model 3, 1GB video ram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Exact values subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL. AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Grey Galactic is a real time strategy game in space where you build up your planets and ships to conquer your enemies. Develop your empire and fleet of spaceships to destroy your enemies and take over the galaxy! Do you have what it takes to become the best Fleet Captain the UFMC has ever seen?
